name: Curtis BRANDON, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary, Dorina Varner, Chief Grievance Officer, John Kerestes, Superintendent, Michael Dunkle, Lieutenant, Meyers, Sergeant, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees

parties: Curtis BRANDON, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary, Dorina Varner, Chief Grievance Officer, John Kerestes, Superintendent, Michael Dunkle, Lieutenant, Meyers, Sergeant, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of October, 2009, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
5 A.3d 260
Curtis BRANDON, Appellant v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Secretary, Dorina Varner, Chief Grievance Officer, John Kerestes, Superintendent, Michael Dunkle, Lieutenant, Meyers, Sergeant, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al., Appellees.
